00032 void DATFileUpdaterTest::testCreation()
00033 {
00034         std::string filename = "DAT_file";
00035         WriteDatFile(filename);
00036         DATData data(filename);
00037         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00038         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00039 }

00041 void DATFileUpdaterTest::GlobalGridTest()
00042 {
00043         std::string filename = "DAT_GlobalGrid";
00044         WriteGlobalGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00045         u_int32_t status1;
00046         FRegion region1;
00047         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00048         ReadGlobalGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00049         DATData data(filename);
00050         AddGlobalGridData(data, 1.0);
00051         AddParameters(data);
00052         u_int32_t status2 = data.GetGlobalGridStatus();
00053         FRegion region2 = data.GetGlobalGrid();
00054         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00055         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00058         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00059 }

00103 void DATFileUpdaterTest::SubGridTest()
00104 {
00105         std::string filename = "DAT_SubGrid";
00106         WriteSubGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00107         Uint32Vector status1;
00108         FRegionVector region1;
00109         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00110         ReadSubGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00111         DATData data(filename);
00112         AddSubGridData(data, 1.0);
00113         AddParameters(data);
00114         Uint32Vector status2;
00115         FRegionVector region2;
00116         GetSubGridData(data, region2, status2);
00117         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00118         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00119         if (region1 == region2)
00120                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00122         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00123 }

00147 void DATFileUpdaterTest::SubGridIIITest()
00148 {
00149         std::string filename = "DAT_SubGrid_III";
00150         WriteSubGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00151         DATData data(filename);
00152         AddSubGridData(data, 7.0);
00153         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00154         updater.Update();
00155         Uint32Vector status1;
00156         FRegionVector region1;
00157         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00158         ReadSubGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00159         DATData data2(filename);
00160         AddSubGridData(data2, 7.0);
00161         AddParameters(data);
00162         Uint32Vector status2;
00163         FRegionVector region2;
00164         GetSubGridData(data2, region2, status2);
00165         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00166         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00169         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00170 }

00172 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteDatFile(const std::string& filename)
00173 {
00174         DATData data(filename);
00175         data.SetPixelCount(10);
00176         data.SetStatsCount(10);
00177         data.SetPixelSize(.7F);
00178         data.SetScannerID(L"main");
00179         data.SetScannerType(L"M10");
00180         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg-small");
00181         data.SetRows(4);
00182         data.SetCols(5);
00183         DATFileWriter* writer = new DATFileWriter(data);
00184         u_int16_t s[] = { 16, 22, 14, 39, 26, 36 };
00185         Uint16Vector stats;
00186         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00187         {
00188                 stats.push_back(s[i]);
00189         }
00190         writer->WriteStats(stats);
00191 
00192         u_int16_t p[] = { 36, 3, 7, 8, 11, 2 };
00193         Uint16Vector pixels;
00194         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00195         {
00196                 pixels.push_back(p[i]);
00197         }
00198         writer->WritePixels(pixels);
00199         delete writer;
00200 }

00202 bool DATFileUpdaterTest::IsEqual(const FRegionVector& r1, const FRegionVector& r2)
00203 {
00204         if(r1.size() == r2.size())
00205         {
00206                 size_t sz = r1.size();
00207                 for(size_t i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00208                 {
00209                         if(r1[i] == r2[i]) continue;
00210                         return false;
00211                 }
00212                 return true;
00213         }
00214         return false;
00215 }

00217 void DATFileUpdaterTest::GetSubGridData(const DATData& data, FRegionVector& regions, Uint32Vector& status)
00218 {
00219         int32_t cnt = data.GetSubgridCnt();
00220         for(int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00221         {
00222                 FRegion region = data.GetSubgrid(i);
00223                 regions.push_back(region);
00224                 status.push_back(data.GetSubgridStatus(i));
00225         }
00226 }

00228 void DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadGlobalGridData(const std::string& filename, FRegion& region, u_int32_t& status, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& params)
00229 {
00230         DATFileReader reader;
00231         DATData data(filename);
00232         reader.Read(data);
00233         region = data.GetGlobalGrid();
00234         status = data.GetGlobalGridStatus();
00235         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00236 }

00238 void DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadSubGridData(const std::string& filename, FRegionVector& regions, Uint32Vector& status, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& params)
00239 {
00240         DATFileReader reader;
00241         DATData data(filename);
00242         reader.Read(data);
00243         GetSubGridData(data, regions, status);
00244         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00245 }

00247 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteGlobalGridDatFile(const std::string& filename, float increment)
00248 {
00249         WriteDatFile(filename);
00250         DATData data(filename);
00251         AddGlobalGridData(data, increment);
00252         AddParameters(data);
00253         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00254         updater.Update();
00255 }

00257 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteSubGridDatFile(const std::string& filename, float increment)
00258 {
00259         WriteGlobalGridDatFile(filename, increment);
00260         DATData data(filename);
00261         AddSubGridData(data, increment);
00262         AddParameters(data);
00263         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00264         updater.Update();
00265 }
00266 
00267 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddSubGridData(DATData& data, float increment)
00268 {
00269         for(int n = 0; n < 4; n++)
00270         {
00271                 FRegion region;
00272                 float ptVal = 0.0;
00273                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00274                 {
00275                         FPoint point;
00276                         point.x = ptVal;
00277                         ptVal += increment;
00278                         point.y = ptVal;
00279                         region.pts.push_back(point);
00280                 }
00281 
00282                 u_int32_t status = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00283                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00284                         status = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00285 
00286                 data.AddSubgrid(status, region);
00287         }
00288 }
00289 
00290 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddGlobalGridData(DATData& data, float increment)
00291 {
00292         FRegion region;
00293         float ptVal = 0.0;
00294         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00295         {
00296                 FPoint point;
00297                 point.x = ptVal;
00298                 ptVal += increment;
00299                 point.y = ptVal;
00300                 region.pts.push_back(point);
00301         }
00302         u_int32_t status = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00303         data.SetGlobalGrid(status, region);
00304 }

00306 void DATFileUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdTest()
00307 {
00308         std::string filename = "DAT_FileIdTest";
00309         WriteDatFile(filename);
00310         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = ReadFileId(filename);
00311 
00312         DATData data(filename);
00313         AddGlobalGridData(data, 1.0);
00314         
00315         { // Need to force DATFileUpdater destructor between being able to read the file properly.
00316                 DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00317                 updater.Update();
00318         }
00319         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = ReadFileId(filename);
00320 
00321         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId != newFileId);
00322 }
00323 
00324 AffymetrixGuidType DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadFileId(const std::string& filename)
00325 {
00326         DATFileReader reader;
00327         DATData data(filename);
00328         reader.Read(data);
00329         
00330         return data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00331 }
00332 
00333 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddParameters(DATData& data)
00334 {
00335         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00336         nvt.SetName(L"Santa Clara");
00337         nvt.SetValueUInt8(56);
00338         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00339 
00340         nvt.SetName(L"San Mateo");
00341         nvt.SetValueFloat(4.56f);
00342         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00343 }
00344 
00345 void DATFileUpdaterTest::CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(ParameterNameValueTypeVector& left, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& right)
00346 {
00347         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left.size() == right.size());
00348 
00349         for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::size_type i = 0; i < left.size(); ++i)
00350         {
00351                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetName() == right[i].GetName());
00352                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetParameterType() == right[i].GetParameterType());
00353 
00354                 switch(left[i].GetParameterType())
00355                 {
00356                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00357                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetValueFloat() == right[i].GetValueFloat());
00358                         break;
00359                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00360                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetValueUInt8() == right[i].GetValueUInt8());
00361                         break;
00362     default:
00363                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00364       break;
00365                 }
00366         }
00367 }
